author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...TROPICAL DEPRESSION SIX-E FORMS OFFSHORE SOUTHERN MEXICO... ...TROPICAL STORM WATCHES ISSUED ALONG THE COAST OF SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO...
summary: ...TROPICAL DEPRESSION SIX-E FORMS OFFSHORE SOUTHERN MEXICO... ...TROPICAL STORM WATCHES ISSUED ALONG THE COAST OF SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO... As of 3:00 AM CST Sun Jun 29 the center of Six-E was located near 13.0, -99.5 with movement W at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1008 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 30 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...TROPICAL DEPRESSION SIX-E FORMS OFFSHORE SOUTHERN MEXICO... ...TROPICAL STORM WATCHES ISSUED ALONG THE COAST OF SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO... As of 3:00 AM CST Sun Jun 29 the center of Six-E was located near 13.0, -99.5 with movement W at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1008 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 30 mph.

title: Summary for Tropical Depression Six-E (EP1/EP062025)
